column5: Hi everyone, i went to BPS today and bought a bag of these soft plastic gobies i think it was on sale  mainly because of the package... althought it didn't show it was on sale when they scaned it at the check out which i didn't notice until i got home but um..anyways has anyone used these before? i 'm thinking of using them for pike with a flaping jig , would that work? (it's the bag in the lower right corner of the pic)
never used that particular brand, but used many like it. i personally like the strike king goby. deadly bait on a football head jig. lots of ways to rig and fish it.
^ thanks guys i'll post up a report if i catch anything =]
Next time...grab a few bags of the LUNKERHUNT Gobies...they are awesome! Work great on Bass!
got some Phenix Goby Tubes, Lunkerhunt Gobies and Bass assasin gobies. Ain't tried them yet.
I fish alot of goby style baits. I also use a new product that came out last yer that makes them swim like they are real. Its made by Buckeye Lures and its called the Goby Sled.
